General.Name: Regenbogen AG
General.Description: Regenbogen AG operates holiday resorts in Germany. The company's holiday resorts offer camping; gastronomy; rental caravans and tents; accommodation; animation, such as mini disco, rallies, painting, and nature-related games; and wellness services. Regenbogen AG was founded in 1991 and is based in Kiel, Germany.

0.Name: Mr. Michael  Erhardt
0.Title: MD & Chairman of the Supervisory Board
